name: Chameleon The Explorer
description:
The diversity of our planet fascinates and inspires. We open new horizons while travelling, expand the bounds of opportunities and look for ourselves. Chameleon The Explorer knows this not by hearsay. This experienced adventurer has been in the places which couldn`t be drawn even by the most perverted imagination. He came out from the water being dry, went through the fire with a smile. But even such professionals need help sometimes. Now this colorful traveler faces a new, incredible danger, and he can rely only on you! 

FEATURES:

* Impressive landscapes
* Flying snacks
* Underworld
* Space adventures
